title: Software Engineer, API
location: New York City, NY, United States
description:
Vine is the best way to see and share life in motion. We’re building services to help people come together in a new and profound way. We genuinely love what we do and are looking for others who share this passion.


Vine is seeking a Software Engineer to join our growing team in NYC.


Responsibilities

  • Design and implement new features for the Vine API, website, and administrative tools
  • Write well documented and tested python code
  • Perform load testing to ensure that new designs can scale
  • Work with operations to make sure that software is running optimally in production
  • Participate in the on-call rotation for production systems
  • Address software quality issues as they arise
  • Contribute ideas for new features and identify areas for improvement proactively

Qualifications

  • 3+ years of industry experience at a large-scale internet service
  • B.S. in computer science (or comparable)
  • Fluency in Python, Java, C++, or similar (Python strongly preferred)
  • Solid foundation in data structures, algorithms and complexity analysis
  • Experience with distributed caching techniques
  • Experience with Linux/Unix/BSD
  • Production experience with relational databases (we use MySQL)
  • Comfortable working in a small, high-growth, and fast paced development environment

Desired

  • Experience with AWS
  • A working knowledge of Scala
  • Active user of Vine and Twitter

title: Android Engineer
location: New York City, NY, United States
description:
Vine is building the world’s most influential mobile video platform. We’re a small team, headquartered in NYC, that ships products affecting hundreds of millions of people around the world. We genuinely love what we do and are looking for others who share this passion.

Responsibilities:

  • Work with Product Design to create UI’s that delight our growing user base

  • Interface with the API team and other engineering groups to deliver well integrated solutions

  • Prototype product concepts

  • Mentor other mobile engineers as we continue to grow our team and product

  • Contribute ideas for new features and identify areas for improvement

  • Own software quality for Vine on Android

Qualifications:

  • Knowledge of the Android ecosystem and community

  • B.S in computer science or comparable

  • Strong computer science fundamentals

  • Experience developing with the NDK

  • Experience developing applications for Android that use the camera and video playback

  • Comfortable working through the entire stack from user interface through the systems levels

  • Love to hack

Desired:

  • Contributions to open source projects

  • Experience developing applications for iOS

  • Active user of Vine and Twitter

title: iOS Engineer
location: New York City, NY, United States
description:
Vine is building the world’s most influential mobile video platform. We’re a small team, headquartered in NYC, that ships products affecting hundreds of millions of people around the world. We genuinely love what we do and are looking for others who share this passion.

 Responsibilities 

  • Design and implement new features for Vine’s iPhone app
  • Work with Product Design to create interfaces that delight our growing user base
  • Interface with the API team and other engineering groups to deliver well integrated solutions
  • Prototype product concepts frequently
  • Proactively contribute ideas for new features and identify areas for improvement
  • Own software quality for Vine on iPhone

 

Qualifications

 

  • 4+ years of object-oriented software development experience
  • 2+ years developing iOS applications in Objective C
  • B.S in computer science or comparable
  • Significant involvement in the development of at least 2 shipped apps in the App Store
  • Comfortable working through the entire stack from user interface through the systems levels
  • Knowledge of UIKit, Cocoa Touch, and Xcode
  • Love to hack

 

Desired

 

  • Experience working with AV Foundation and OpenGL
  • Contributions to open source projects
  • Experience developing applications for the iPad
  • Active user of Vine and Twitter 

Equal Opportunity Employer: All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, marital status, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status or any other characteristic protected by law applicable to the state in which you work.

title: Web Engineer
location: New York City, NY, United States
description:
Software Engineer- Web

Vine is building the world’s most influential mobile video platform. We’re a small team, headquartered in NYC, that ships products affecting hundreds of millions of people around the world. We genuinely love what we do and are looking for others who share this passion.

Responsibilities

  • Design and implement new features for Vine embeds, Vine.co website, admin internal tools, and web views

  • Write well structured and tested code

  • Implement beautiful layouts using CSS and HTML

  • Interface with the API team and other engineering groups to deliver well integrated solutions

  • Address software quality issues as they arise

  • Contribute ideas for new features and identify areas for improvement proactively

Qualifications

  • 5+ years developing web and mobile web applications for a consumer internet company

  • B.S in computer science or comparable

  • Deep experience with cross browser quirks and compatibility issues

  • Thorough understanding of Javascript best practices

  • Solid understanding of the full web technology stack (e.g. HTTP, cookies, headers, asset loading / caching)

  • Loves to hack

Desired

  • Contributions to open source projects

  • Experience writing web applications with Node, Ember, Angular, React

  • Experience working with iOS or Android

  • Active user of Vine and Twitter

title: Head of Product
location: New York City, NY, United States
description:
Head of Product

Vine is looking for a Head of Product to help define the future of storytelling. In this role, you will work with UX and Engineering to author and oversee the execution of Vine’s product strategy and roadmap. You will sit in the most senior level of decision makers at Vine, reporting directly to its GM, and will directly manage and grow a team of PMs.

Responsibilities

  • Define the future of video entertainment and storytelling

  • Craft a product roadmap and strategy

  • Work closely with UX, Engineering, and other cross-functional teammates

  • Work closely with data science and research to understand how people use Vine

  • Act as a representative for Vine to senior executives at Twitter and externally

  • Manage and grow a team of product managers


Qualifications

  • 7+ year of product management experience

  • 4+ years of people management

  • Experience leading cross-functional teams

  • Outstanding written & verbal communication skills

  • Knowledge of mobile design patterns and industry trends


Desired

  • Familiarity with one or more programming languages

  • A deep appreciation for elegant, thoughtful design

  • A tendency toward crazy, big ideas

  • Absurd levels of creativity

  • A love of storytelling

  • Active user of Vine

title: Office Dog
location: New York City, NY, United States
description:
Vine is seeking a dog to join our growing team of humans.

Vine is the best way to see and share life in motion. We’re building tools to help people and animals come together in a new and profound way. We genuinely love what we do and are looking for canines who share this passion.

Responsibilities

  • Welcomes employees as they arrive
  • Keep employees from working too hard
  • Provides kisses whenever called upon
  • Train other dogs around the area
  • Smell OK

Qualifications

  • Potty trained
  • Neutered
  • CUTE
  • Relatively quiet
  • Can’t reach my lunch
  • Boundless enthusiasm for staring into the distance at absolutely nothing whatsoever
  • Vineable
  • Hypoallergenic
  • Gets along with other office dogs
  • Familiar with Woof, Arf, Bark, Sniff, Deploy! (WABS)
  • Computer science degree from Ivy League school
  • Can catch midair multiple remote controlled helis concurrently

Desired

  • Fur
  • SNUGGLES!
  • Looks into camera on command
  • Does not chew on cables
  • Does not pee on rugs
  • Returns stolen items to owner after playing
  • Rolls over

Vine is a small team in NYC working out of a brand new office right by Madison Square Park. Click here to apply online.

Equal Opportunity Employer: All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to breed, color, paw size, ear length, pound history or any other characteristic protected by law applicable to the state in which you work.
